languages.text: {n}Вигдис вздыхает.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... два пустотника перед смертью успели прокричать про то, как их товарищи исчезают в кровавом облаке и вываливатся из него по кускам... ваши блюстители обучены подавлять бунты среди людей, а не смертельно опасных ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис вздыхает.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... два пустотника перед смертью успели прокричать про то, как их товарищи исчезают в кровавом облаке и вываливатся из него по кускам... ваши блюстители обучены подавлять бунты среди людей, а не смертельно опасных ксеносов".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис вздыхает.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... два пустотника перед смертью успели прокричать про то, как их товарищи исчезают в кровавом облаке и вываливатся из него по кускам... ваши блюстители обучены подавлять бунты среди людей, а не смертельно опасных ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen shouted before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers were trained to suppress riots among humans, not to restrain deadly xenos."

{n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen shouted before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers were trained to suppress riots among humans, not to restrain deadly xenos."

{n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

{n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

{n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯叹了口气。{/n}“舰长大人……几个船员临死前告诉我们，说他们的战友在血腥的雾气中不断消失，只剩下残缺的尸骸……您的执法者接受的训练都是用来镇压人类的叛乱，并非用来对付致命的异形。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯叹了口气。{/n}“舰长大人……几个船员临死前告诉我们，说他们的战友在血腥的雾气中不断消失，只剩下残缺的尸骸……您的执法者接受的训练都是用来镇压人类的叛乱，并非用来对付致命的异形。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis soupire.{/n} « Avant de mourir, deux cosmomarins ont réussi à nous contacter en disant que leurs camarades disparaissaient dans un brouillard sanglant pour n'en ressortir qu'en morceaux... Vos prévôts sont entraînés à réprimer des mutineries humaines, pas des xénos sanguinaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis soupire.{/n} « Avant de mourir, deux cosmomarins ont réussi à nous contacter en disant que leurs camarades disparaissaient dans un brouillard sanglant pour n'en ressortir qu'en morceaux... Vos prévôts sont entraînés à réprimer des mutineries humaines, pas des xénos sanguinaires. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis suspira.{/n} «Lord Capitán... antes de morir, varios infantes del vacío han podido decirnos que sus compañeros desaparecían en una explosión de sangre para luego convertirse en pedazos... Su personal de seguridad está entrenado para suprimir motines organizados por humanos, no para detener a un xenos desatado».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis suspira.{/n} «Lord Capitán... antes de morir, varios infantes del vacío han podido decirnos que sus compañeros desaparecían en una explosión de sangre para luego convertirse en pedazos... Su personal de seguridad está entrenado para suprimir motines organizados por humanos, no para detener a un xenos desatado».

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスはため息をついた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…2人組のヴォイズマンが、仲間が血まみれの霧の中に消えていき、バラバラになって出てきたと、死ぬ前に伝えてきました… あなたのエンフォーサーたちは、人間の暴動を鎮圧することはできても、凶暴な異種族を拘束する訓練はしていません」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスはため息をついた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…2人組のヴォイズマンが、仲間が血まみれの霧の中に消えていき、バラバラになって出てきたと、死ぬ前に伝えてきました… あなたのエンフォーサーたちは、人間の暴動を鎮圧することはできても、凶暴な異種族を拘束する訓練はしていません」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis seufzt.{/n} "Lord Captain ... vor ihrem Tod konnten uns zwei Raumfahrer mitteilen, dass ihre Kameraden in einem blutigen Nebel verblassten und in Stücke zerfetzt wieder auftauchten ... Eure Enforcers wurden speziell ausgebildet, Aufstände von Menschen zu unterdrücken, nicht um mit tödlichen Xenos fertig zu werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis seufzt.{/n} "Lord Captain ... vor ihrem Tod konnten uns zwei Raumfahrer mitteilen, dass ihre Kameraden in einem blutigen Nebel verblassten und in Stücke zerfetzt wieder auftauchten ... Eure Enforcers wurden speziell ausgebildet, Aufstände von Menschen zu unterdrücken, nicht um mit tödlichen Xenos fertig zu werden."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis iç çekiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... İki uçsuz erimiz ölmeden evvel silah arkadaşlarının kızıl bir sisle kaybolup parçalar hâlinde geri döndüklerini bildirdi... İnfazcılarınız; insan isyanlarını bastırmak için eğitildi, ölümcül zenoları dizginlemek için değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis sighs.{/n} "Lord Captain... a pair of voidsmen managed to relay to us before dying that their comrades are disappearing into a bloody fog only to emerge in pieces... Your enforcers are trained to suppress human riots, not to restrain deadly xenos."
